name: Tyne & Tees Day Ranger
description:
TYNE & TEES DAY RANGER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for one day extending from Morpeth in the north to Northallerton in the south and from Hexham and Bishop Auckland in the 
      west to Saltburn and Whitby in the east and includes Newcastle, Sunderland, Middlesbrough and Darlington. You can visit the North Yorkshire Moors Railway at Grosmont, Locomotion Museum at Shildon and the Head of Steam Museum at Darlington.
